value:
Powerful forces gather here from
across time and space, I see... And
you form bonds with each of them.

Chrom saved me. He told me that
my life was worth living—that we
could change my fate together...

You shouldn't fall asleep in a place
like this or you'll catch cold. Come,
let's get you to a proper bed.

I consider myself a tactician; that is
how Chrom always referred to me...
You and I are similar in that regard.

I'd like to meet Heroes from other
worlds—those with knowledge about
dragons, if at all possible...

Greetings. I am Robin. I've wanted
to meet you since first hearing of
you from $Nf.

It's the duty of a tactician to look for
the next move even after a success.
One mustn't rest on their laurels.

That strategy played out beautifully.
Let's keep this up and press on
toward victory.

I wish I could say this is all according
to plan...but these things happen.

I can't believe I'm a Legendary Hero...
I'd feel odd telling Chrom and the
others. I simply want to offer support.

I'm Robin, a tactician of Ylisse. Being
called a Legendary Hero is humbling.
...What do they say about me?

If the name Robin is now a legend,
it's only proof that I was saved from
my fate by Chrom and the others.$k$pLucina once told me that in a cruel
future, shrouded in darkness, I had
killed someone I held dear...$k$pI don't know how that fate changed...
There was never any obvious sign.
I only know my friends didn't give up.$k$pChrom, Lucina...all of them fought
against that fate without reservation.
They held their hopes close.$k$pWhen such hearts cry out to one
another like that, they can join to
create something powerful.$k$pAs Chrom says, we changed fate...
That's the power of those bonds.
I should know. I'm living proof.$k$pI can tell that you have bonds that
are just as strong. That is why I want
to protect this world of yours.
Defeat is not an option!
All according to plan.
I'll put an end to this.
For my friends!
It can't end this way...
Me? Legendary? I don't see how.
*startled* You're quite the mischief-maker!
If my achievements are worthy of legend, it's only because I've had the support of so many wonderful friends and allies.
I'm sure Chrom will find it hilarious that people think of me as a Legendary Hero.
This is a tactician's outfit. Let me guess—you have one just like it.
Thank you, everyone. Thank you for believing in me.
If my strategies are of any use to you at all, then I'm happy.
I see a way forward.
Is there a problem?
We'll carve a path.
